posts.post_content:
Hi there - I'm doing a nice art piece with the T206's and I'm looking for the more difficult backs.

I have a framed piece of artwork in which I would like to showcase as many of the T206 back variations that I can; I am NOT (I repeat, NOT) looking for any high dollar cards; just some beaters.

I'm looking for beaters of EPDG, Uzit, Drum, Lenox, AB, CB and Hindu's (haha I know, stop laughing - you never know!); I could care less about condition - the cheaper the better! If you have any laying around and want to dump, let me know (I only need one of each).  

PS - if you have the backs, but no fronts, that's ok too!
